TextEng: Who are you?
I'd like to ask you some questions.
Who you be?
Me want ask questions.
Goodbye.
What do you know of the cultists who beset Neverwinter?
Text: 네버윈터를 괴롭히는 사교도들에 대해 뭘 아시나요?

TextEng: I'm looking for work, if you know of any.
Text: 일거리를 찾고 있는데, 혹시 아는 게 있나요?

TextEng: I need some directions.
You know stuff 'bout da cult from Neverwinter?
Me look for job. You got one?
Me need directions.
What other things are on your mind?
What be on you mind?
Where does the west road lead?
Where does the east road lead?
Where can I go to buy supplies?
Text: 어디 가서 물건을 살 수 있죠?

TextEng: Maybe I could ask you something else.
Where da west road go?
Where da east road go?
Me need buy stuff, yuh?
Me got other question.
Tell me about this favor.
You tell me 'bout favor, yuh?
What's so important about the brooch?
Can't you just buy the brooch from her?
Tell me about Constance.
Okay, I'll do it.
Why you want brooch so much?
Why you not just pay her for brooch?
Text: 왜 그녀한테 브로치 값 안 줘?

TextEng: Tell me 'bout Constance, yuh?
Okay, me do it.
I have some more questions about Constance.
Could give me an advance on this reward you're promising?
Text: 약속한 보상을 선불로 줄 수 있나요?

TextEng: Me got some questions 'bout job.
Me want money up front to do this.
What's so important about this brooch again?
Text: 이 브로치가 왜 그렇게 중요하다고 했죠?

TextEng: Tell me again where I can find her.
Text: 그녀를 어디서 찾을 수 있는지 다시 말해주세요.

TextEng: Tell me about Constance again.
Is there anything else about her you're not telling me?
Text: 그녀에 대해 말 안 한 게 더 있나요?

TextEng: Why you want dis brooch again?
Text: 너 왜 이 브로치 원한다고 했어?

TextEng: You say again where Miss Constants be.
Text: 콘스탄스 양 어디 있는지 다시 말해줘.

TextEng: Tell me more 'bout Miss Constants, yuh?
Text: 콘스탄스 양에 대해 더 말해줘, 응?

TextEng: There be more stuff 'bout dis job you not tell me?
Text: 이 일에 대해 말 안 한 거 더 있어?

TextEng: I want to talk about that brooch again.
Text: 그 브로치에 대해 다시 얘기하고 싶습니다.

TextEng: We talk 'bout dat brooch again, yuh?
Text: 그 브로치에 대해 다시 얘기하자, 응?

TextEng: You mentioned something about a job before.
You was talking 'bout job before.
I have the brooch.
Me got brooch here, yuh.
Now, about that reward you mentioned...
You said you give reward, yuh?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> She wasn't easy to convince, you know. I think you could spare a little more.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그녀를 설득하기 쉽지 않았어요. 좀 더 줄 수 있을 것 같은데요.

TextEng: You'd better cough up more or you won't live long enough to regret it!
Text: 더 내놓는 게 좋을 겁니다. 안 그러면 후회할 시간도 없을 테니까!

TextEng: Thanks. It was a joy to help.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me work hard for this. You give more gold, yes?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 나 이거 위해 열심히 했어. 너 금화 더 줘, 응?

TextEng: Me want more gold! Give more or you be sorry and dead... at da same time!
Text: 나 금화 더 원해! 더 줘 아니면 너 후회하고 죽어... 동시에!

TextEng: Thanks, yuh? Me like work for you.
Text: 고마워, 응? 나 너 위해 일하는 거 좋아.

TextEng: I suppose the reward is adequate.
Me guess reward be okay.
Surely you could spare more for a fellow of <race> blood?
Text: 같은 <race> 혈통에게는 더 줄 수 있지 않나요?

TextEng: You give me more cause we both be <race> kind, 'kay?
Text: 우리 둘 다 <race>니까 너 나한테 더 줘, 알았지?

TextEng: That's a lot of money. Are you sure you can afford it?
Text: 꽤 큰돈인데요. 정말 감당할 수 있나요?

TextEng: That be big heap of money. How you afford it?
Text: 그거 엄청 큰 돈이야. 어떻게 감당해?

TextEng: Wanev? Who's he?
Wanev? Who that?
What would your ma think about this?
Wha' your ma think 'bout dis, you think... I think...
Text: 네 엄마 이거 어떻게 생각할까, 너 생각은... 나 생각은...

TextEng: How do you know she doesn't want money?
Text: 그녀가 돈을 원하지 않는다는 걸 어떻게 알죠?

TextEng: How you know she not want money?
Text: 너 그녀가 돈 원하지 않는다는 거 어떻게 알아?

TextEng: Maybe we can turn the tables: I'll flirt with her.
Text: 역으로 해볼까요. 제가 그녀한테 작업을 걸게요.

TextEng: Maybe we turn da table, yuh? Me be da flirter.
Text: 역으로 해볼까, 응? 나 작업 거는 사람이 될게.

TextEng: You be safer if you no ask questions.
Text: 질문 안 하는 게 더 안전할 거야.

TextEng: Probably safer for you if you don't ask that question again.
Text: 그런 질문은 다시 안 하는 게 안전할 겁니다.

TextEng: Me just lookin' round.
I was just exploring.
You dad say you need cheer up.
Text: 네 아빠가 너 기운 북돋아 줄 필요 있다고 했어.

TextEng: Your father told me you could use some cheering up.
Me not do favor; me only do stuff for pay.
Text: 나 부탁 안 해. 나 돈 받고만 일해.

TextEng: I don't do favors; I do jobs. You want to pay me for this, then you should tell me about it.
Text: 전 부탁은 안 들어드립니다. 일을 하죠. 이걸 하려면 돈을 주셔야 하고, 그럼 말씀해 주세요.

TextEng: So, what you want do now me here?
Text: 그래서, 내가 여기 있으니 뭐 하고 싶어?

TextEng: So, what do you propose to do about it?
Why not?
You gots to be jokin'. Me no want you for that!
Text: 농담하는 거겠지. 나 그런 거 원하지 않아!

TextEng: Slow down there boy. I'm not here for that.
Text: 진정해요, 친구. 전 그런 거 아닙니다.

TextEng: What you talkin' bout?
What do you mean by that?
